content: peek-a-boo blankie materials 12 oz mc 6 oz ca 4 oz cb sizes k and l crochet hook body with mc and size l hook chain 80 row 1 single_crochet in 2nd chain from hook single_crochet in remaining chain across chain 2 turn 79 single_crochet row 2 single_crochet in 1st single_crochet chain 1 skip next single_crochet *single_crochet in next single_crochet chain 1 skip next single_crochet* across chain 2 turn note chain 2 counts as first half_double_crochet now and throughout row 3 half_double_crochet in next chain 1 space chain 1 skip next single_crochet half_double_crochet in next chain 1 space across to last chain 1 space half_double_crochet in last chain 1 space chain 1 half_double_crochet in top of chain 1 space chain 4 turn note chain 4 counts as first double_crochet + chain 1 now and throughout row 4 skip first chain 1 space and 1st half_double_crochet double_crochet in next chain 1 space chain 1 skip next half_double_crochet across to last two half_double_crochet skip next half_double_crochet double_crochet in top of chain 2 space chain 2 turn row 5 half_double_crochet in first chain 1 space chain 1 skip next double_crochet half_double_crochet in next chain 1 space across to last chain 1 space chain 1 half_double_crochet in last chain 1 space half_double_crochet in 3rd chain of chain 4 chain 1 turn row 6 single_crochet in first half_double_crochet chain 1 skip next half_double_crochet single_crochet in next chain 1 space chain 1 skip next half_double_crochet across to last chain 1 space single_crochet in last chain 1 space chain 1 skip next half_double_crochet single_crochet in top of chain 2 chain 1 turn row 7 single_crochet in each single_crochet and chain 1 space across chain 3 turn 79 single_crochet note each chain 3 counts as first double_crochet now and throughout row 8 skip first single_crochet double_crochet in next single_crochet across chain 3 turn row 9-10 skip first double_crochet double_crochet across to chain 3 double_crochet in top of chain 3 space chain 3 turn row 11 skip first double_crochet double_crochet across to chain 3 double_crochet in top of chain 3 chain 1 turn row 12 single_crochet in first double_crochet chain 1 skip next double_crochet single_crochet in next double_crochet across to last 2 double_crochet chain 1 skip next double_crochet single_crochet in 2nd chain of chain 3 chain 2 turn repeat row 3-12 until piece measures approximately 32 inches from top to bottom repeat row 3-7 once more fasten_off weave in loose ends switch to smaller hook edging with size k hook join ca with slip_stitch in top left corner round 1 chain 1 single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet all in same space *work 95 single_crochet evenly to next corner single_crochet c1 single_crochet all in next corner space 77 single_crochet across to next corner* work single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet in corner repeat from * to * around to beginning chain 1 join with slip_stitch in 1st chain 1 space chain 1 mark as beginning of round round 2 single_crochet chain 1 single_crochet all in corner chain 1 space single_crochet in each single_crochet
